item.title: 2021 ICE Presidential Address Notes
item.description: 2021 ICE Presidential Address Notes ICE Presidential Address 2021, online Current President: Ed McCann Rachel Skinner passes over the baton to Ed McCann.

item.title: 2022 Presidential Address Notes
item.description: 2022 Presidential Address Notes Keith Howells takes over from Ed McCann, as ICE President for 2022. ðŸ•™ See last year’s notes: 2021 ICE Presidential Address Notes

item.title: Chartered Civil Engineer (CEng)
item.description: Chartered Civil Engineer (CEng) A Chartered Member of the [[Institution of Civil Engineers]] is an individual who has shown the ability and gained sufficient experience to be recognsied as at the top of their field.

item.title: ICE Code of Conduct
item.description: ICE Code of Conduct The ICE Code of Conduct can be summarised by one phrase: do the right thing. The code of conduct sets out a set of duties which should be followed by ICE members in order to behave ethically and in standing with the ICE.

item.title: Institution of Civil Engineers
item.description: Institution of Civil Engineers The Institution of Civil Engineers is the leading professional engineering body and charitable body for civil engineering.

item.title: Professional Report
item.description: Professional Report The professional report is the main way of evidencing your development and knowledge, showing that you have the accumen and ability to become a Chartered Civil Engineer (CEng).

item.title: Professional Review
item.description: Professional Review The Professional Review is the final stage of becoming a [[Chartered Civil Engineer (CEng)]]. As per the ICE guidance report, the following stages need to be completed prior to sitting the professional review.
